data.name: VEGA Conflict - Revelation Pack (Discounted)
data.detailed_description:
The Revelation Pack will help you to move up the ladder and obliterate anything standing in your path! It contains:

Revelation Cruiser (x4) - This powerful cruiser ship is armed to the teeth, with enough armor and shields to initiate heavy assaults.

2000 Coins - Providing you with the ability to build upon your base assets with the latest tech and resources. Bonus Coins will really help you make your mark in the sector.

Bonus consumable equipment credits to equip your deadly Revelation Cruisers:

- Thermal Beam II (x16)
- Spectral Shield III (x8)
- Tritanium III (x16)
- Energy Resistor II (x4)
- Ion Modulator II (x4)

data.short_description: Take your fleets to the next level with the Revelation Pack! Buy now and claim these titans of combat: the Revelation Cruisers. Your enemies won't know what hit 'em, rebel.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP+
  • Processor: Dual Core 1.8GHz, SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX9 (shader model 2.0) capabilities
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any compatible with OS

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.7+
  • Processor: Dual Core 1.8GHz, SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any compatible with OS
